sn7.3:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn7.3:4.3: “bhāradvājagotto brāhmaṇo kira samaṇassa gotamassa santike agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito”ti kupito anattamano yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn7.3:4.4: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ asabbhāhi pharusāhi vācāhi akkosati paribhāsati.
sn7.3:4.6: Atha kho asurindakabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn7.3:9.1: Evaṃ vutte, asurindakabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn7.3:9.4: Aññataro ca panāyasmā bhāradvājo arahataṃ ahosīti.
